result.title: I-NERGY Pilots Evaluation, Best Practices and Replication Guidelines
result.description: An overall assessment and evaluation of the I-NERGY impact will be presented in D5.5. Lessons learnt from the I-NERGY (regarding the implementation, operation and execution of the pilots) will be resented in D5.5, formulating them as methodological adoption guidelines for the further exploitation and utilisation of the I-NERGY.
